p: T. mastichina essential oil was obtained mainly by hydrodistillation, consisting mainly of 1,8-cineole (eucalyptol), linalool, limonene, camphor, borneol, and Î±-terpineol, as well as other volatile compounds. Conversely, despite being lesser studied, T. mastichina extracts using different solvents were also characterized, being composed of 2-methoxysalicylic acid, 3-methoxysalicylic acid apigenin, caffeic acid, chlorogenic acid, kaempferol, luteolin, quercetin, rosmarinic acid, sakuranetin, sterubin, salvianolic acid derivatives, and hexoside and glycoside derivatives, among other constituents.
